Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of a dense, thick forest.
Room.LongDescription: The forest on the west side of the road is protected by the thick trees and shrubs growing around its perimiter, preventing anyone from actually entering the forest, save for a couple of rangers who happen to be searching for tracks. Riverdell continues to the north and south.
